comments.body:
I checked what tar does on my machine and there the padding seems to be 20 x 512 which is somewhat suggested by this spec: https://www.gnu.org/software/tar/manual/html_node/Blocking-Factor.html.

Anyway, it shouldn't matter since any amount of data is skipped at the end.

Would be good to add an actual file created by (some version of) tar itself, or am I missing that?
A user shared a file which blew up in Alpakka with me (it padded with 6x512 bytes), but I can't add that file to the repository.
